name: 古典力學
description: 熟悉力學的經典理論與基本技術，以為日後學習進階理論物理的基礎。
goals: 瞭解古典力學基本觀念與理論
加強物理思維與解題能力
syllabus:
1\. Hamilton’s Variational Principle  
2\. Symmetry and Conservation Laws  
3\. Central Force Fields  
4\. Kepler’s Problem  
5\. Scattering  
6\. Small Oscillations  
7\. Normal Mode Analysis  
8\. The Kinematics of Rigid Body Motion  
9\. Motion in a Non-Inertial Frame of Reference  
10\. The Dynamics of Rigid Body Motion  
11\. The Hamilton Equations of Motion  
12\. Poisson’s Bracket & Generating Functions  
13\. Canonical Transformation  
14\. Hamilton-Jocobi Equations
